mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE( TITLE, CONTENT, REG_DT, NOTICE_SEQ, READ_CNT, USER_NAME, STARCHECK )VALUES( #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE, (SELECT NVL(MAX(NOTICE_SEQ),0)+1 FROM NOTICE), 0, #{user_name}, #{starCheck} )A;
mapper.select:
SELECT TITLE AS title, CONTENT AS content, REG_DT AS regDate, NOTICE_SEQ AS seq, READ_CNT AS read_cnt, USER_NAME AS user_name, STARCHECK AS starCheck FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM ( SELECT * FROM NOTICE ORDER BY NOTICE_SEQ DESC,REG_DT
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endIndex} ) WHERE RNUM >= #{startIndex}
SELECT TITLE AS title, CONTENT AS content, REG_DT AS regDate, NOTICE_SEQ AS seq, READ_CNT AS read_cnt, USER_NAME AS user_name, STARCHECK AS starCheck FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_SEQ = #{seq}
SELECT USER_ID AS user_id FROM USER_INFO WHERE USER_NAME = #{user_name}
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content} WHERE NOTICE_SEQ =#{seq}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM NOTICE
